title: Can you help me to write my book? - Quora

response.answer_text: Without knowing the premise of the book, I can only offer advice on where to start. What type of book do you want to write? Fiction, Non-Fiction? Fantasy? Romance? Mystery? Horror? Cooking?Why are you writing? To entertain? Inform? Persuade others to change their minds? Sarcastically comment on injustices around the world?Where is the setting? Where you live? Tokyo? London? An imaginary world? A classroom? The kitchen?Who is your audience? Children? Teenagers? Adults? Parents? Singles? Hipsters? Cosplayers? Just family or international?What unique perspective or ideas do you have to offer? What values do you wish to convey? What makes this book special to you?

Short answer, yes, BUT would that be as a joint venture, or ghost writer, with credits or without? And then, would I want to commit/have I the time/is it a subject of interest to me and so on. You might think it a simple question. The answer is far more complex.
How much will you pay me?
